justification: Offer ignores Team B’s consistency/schedule focus. B gives a healthy workhorse with a friendly playoff slate for two committee RBs (one with declining role) and a volatile deep-threat WR with tough playoff matchups—poor fit for B’s preferences. Rationale is A-centric and vague, not explaining B’s incentive or leveraging B’s TE depth convincingly. Trade is feasible and offloads B’s Q TE, but value logic is muddled (requesting a Tier-5 ‘workhorse’ while A ships a Tier-1 RB).
